reviewText: Barely any relationship between the videos and the quizzes. Peer-graded assessments were just a joke. Maybe its the problem that arises when you try to standardize something that's meant to be free Flowing and creative. Especially the sales Email assignment was terrible, instead of the quality of the email the focus is on the character count. I have taken up a lot of courses online and by far this is the worst i have come across. When i take a look at what i know now and what i did at the starting of this course, there is barely any difference. More than rules for certain assignments in my opinion there should be just guidelines to follow and the only end result that matters should be the quality of whats written.
Very basic

The titles are interesting and curious to read, but the language is presentation of ideas is not coherent. The teacher does not provide practical techniques that can be used by a startup for marketing . I wish there were many more examples given and an applicable technique presented, that I could use as an entrepreneur.

Good introduction/refresh into the field of sales & marketing for entrepreneurs. To be clear, it is just the tip of the iceberg that is shown, but that is to be expected as it is a short course. But each segment gives enough information to dive deeper if necessary.I give this course 3 out of 5 stars because:The peer graded assignment in week 4 is impossible to handle (you have to find a website/product that is in beta status - nobody has time for that) and no one of the course really cares what happens in the forums. I did ask a question in the beginning which hasn't been answered upon my completion of the course 3 weeks later.

I did enjoy the first few weeks of classes, later It got too boring by the end of the course. Also the structure is kind of lost on why a week is needed and what is being covered. By the way, the pictures shown in the TV doesn't make sense at all.
There was some useful information but most was repetition of what is learned in basic marketing. The assignments and quizzes were not always clear and had glitches.
Really helpful and interesting to learn with really good Professor , who made us learn with the beautiful examples and simple to understand .
Good overview for people with no Knowledge. Could go deeper into the topics.
